channel.title: Special birthday website testing request: News section
channel.description:
Hi all,
I turn 31 today. As a present could you please help improve how IATI organises its news section in our new website (beta released by May). It should take no longer than 10 mins:
https://2zui8if3.optimalworkshop.com/optimalsort/866fc06o
There's no right or wrong answer, just have a go.
A huge thanks to everyone who took the [Publishing Guidance card sort](https://discuss.iatistandard.org/t/website-testing-iati-guidance-section/1257/1).

item.title: Special birthday website testing request: News section
item.dc:creator: Rohini_Simbodyal
item.description:
Thanks very much Melinda

Read full topic
